members.name: actualArrivalTime

constantValues: Shows the time that work started.

members.description: Shows the time that work started.

members.name: actualTravelDuration

constantValues: Shows the total travel duration. If you leave this field blank the system automatically determines the travel duration by calculating the resource journal details.

members.description: Shows the total travel duration. If you leave this field blank the system automatically determines the travel duration by calculating the resource journal details.

members.name: allowOverlapping

constantValues: Allow the time of this booking to be displayed on the schedule assistant as available.

members.description: Allow the time of this booking to be displayed on the schedule assistant as available.

value.name: appointmentBookingId

constantValues: Unique identifier for Appointment associated with Bookable Resource Booking.

value.description: Unique identifier for Appointment associated with Bookable Resource Booking.

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

arguments.explanation: This attribute 'bookingMethod_display' is added to the 'BookableResourceBooking' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'bookingMethod'
arguments.name: bookingMethod_display

members.name: bookingMethod

constantValues: Shows the method used to create this booking.

members.description: Shows the method used to create this booking.

value.name: bookingSetupMetadataId

constantValues: A unique identifier for the booking setup metadata that is associated with a bookable resource booking.

value.description: A unique identifier for the booking setup metadata that is associated with a bookable resource booking.

members.name: cascadeCrewChanges

constantValues: Defines whether changing any of the following fields (Start Time, End Time, Status) should cascade the changes to other bookings on this requirement that have the same start and end time.

members.description: Defines whether changing any of the following fields (Start Time, End Time, Status) should cascade the changes to other bookings on this requirement that have the same start and end time.

members.name: acceptCascadeCrewChanges

constantValues: Defines whether this booking accepts changes propagated as cascading changes

members.description: Defines whether this booking accepts changes propagated as cascading changes

members.name: effort

constantValues: Capacity that needs to take from resource capacity

members.description: Capacity that needs to take from resource capacity

members.name: milesTraveled

constantValues: In this field you can enter the total miles the resource drove to the job site

members.description: In this field you can enter the total miles the resource drove to the job site

value.name: resourceGroup

constantValues: Unique identifier for Resource associated with Resource Booking

value.description: Unique identifier for Resource associated with Resource Booking
